nodes.text: Hewi was a small alien who worked for Taloron Hunter Crutag, whose gang pursued a group of Rebels to the jungle world of Trinta. Whilst on the planet, Crutag was angered when his ship, the Scent of Fear, inexplicably disappeared. Crutag took out his anger on hapless Hewi, punching him in the head, his neck snapping when he hit the ground.
